document_data.name: Grendan Baenre
document_data.mainbody: '''Grendan Baenre''' was a member of [[House Baenre]] who was a tenth-year apprentice at [[Sorcere]] ''circa'' [[1373 DR]]. He was considered handsome and had a flair for [[illusion]].
document_data.History: Gredan was one of the Baenre magic-users that [[Gromph Baenre]] gathered during the [[Siege of Menzoberranzan]] for an attack on [[Nimor Imphraezl]] through a [[scrying]] crystal.
